ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: **** SPOILER **** Actually, the quest initiate with the Drunkard in Kelethin who is their father and he asks you to kill them. Astur il Ayan, Cleric of Brell
ygData.messageBody:
**** SPOILER ****
















Actually, the quest initiate with the Drunkard in Kelethin who is their
father and he asks you to kill them.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
>
> The Nybrights are not human.
>
>
> At 11:18 AM 9/13/1999 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "John N. Mosqueda" <mosquito@...>
> >
> >Brother monk,
> >
> >The Nybright sisters will serve as no obstacle to one of your
> training. Even
> >through fourteen orders of training, I have considered them less than
> equal to
> >the task of one on one combat. Your abilities are best served in
> the undead
> >depths of Unrest or the outlying Cauldron. It would be my hope
> that no monk
> >among us would go so far as to take the life of a fellow human
> in order to
> >gain
